strapiPost.title: Momentary Announces Performance Lineup Through 2022
strapiPost.content:
Embracing the energy of a changing season, the Momentary announced an exciting lineup of unique performance experiences through the end of the year.

  • Coming to you: A diverse lineup of artists will deliver genre-bending performances, from dynamic collaborations between Northwest Arkansas artists to international touring acrobatic theatre, as the contemporary art space continues to host artists engaging in thoughtful experimentation and play.
  • To choose from: Throughout the rest of 2022, guests can experience one-night collaborative performances, weekend experiences, week-long performances, and an entire art festival. From an all-woman acrobatic theatre to a contemporary chamber opera vocalist, composer, and more, there is much to see. So take your pick! Tickets are $0-$20, depending on the event. 

Learn more HERE.
